put.summary: Create or update action type. If ID is provided the entity with the provided ID is updated.

parameters.name: requestType

parameters.description: Number of records to return. Min: 1, default: 100
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Number of records to skip before returning. Default: 0, min: 0
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Column name to be sorted by, varies for each endpoint, default is id

parameters.description: Direction of sorting (ASC or DESC). Default DESC.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.name: id
